renderpass.code:
void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 u) { O-=O; O.a++;
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy,
         U = 44.* ( u+u - R ) /R.y,
         V = U * mat2(1,1,1,-1) *.707;
    O += dot( clamp( -2.*cos(vec2(length(U),V)), 0.,1.) ,
              V.x*sign(V.y) > 2. ? .5*O.ww:O.wx  );
  //O -= 2.*cos(vec2(length(U),V)) [V.x*sign(V.y)>2. ?1:0]       // variant ( or >1.9 )
} 


/*

         V = U * mat2(1,1,1,-1) *.707;                            \
    O += dot( clamp( -2.*cos(vec2(length(U),V)), 0.,1.) ,         \
              abs(V.x)>2. && V.y*V.x > 0. ? .5*O.ww:O.wx  )      /* 
    O += -2.*cos(vec2(length(U),V))[abs(V.x)>1.9 && V.x*V.y > 0. ?1:0]   /* variant

    O += dot( clamp( -R.y/2e2* cos(6.3*vec2(length(U),V)), 0.,1.) , \
              abs(V.x)>.31 && V.y*V.x > 0. ? .5*O.ww:O.wx  )       /*

    O += dot( clamp( R.y/28.* ( abs(abs(mod(vec2(length(U),V)-.5,2.)-1.)-.5) -.25), 0.,1.), \

    vec2 R = iResolution.xy,                          \
         U = 7.* ( u+u - R ) / R.y,                   \

         l = .5 * clamp( R.y/28.* ( abs(abs(mod(vec2(length(U),V.y)-.5,2.)-1.)-.5) -.25), 0.,1.);\
    O += ( abs(V.y)>.31 && V.x*V.y > 0. ? l.y : l.x ) +l.x  /* try without final +l.x

#define S .5 * clamp( R.y/28.* ( abs(abs(mod(l-.5,2.)-1.)-.5) -.25), 0.,1.)//
#define mainImage(O,u)                                \
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy,                          \
         U = 7.* ( u+u - R ) / R.y,                   \
         V = U * mat2(1,-1,1,1) *.707;                \
    float l = length(U), s = S;                       \

renderpass.name: Image
